Suppoted by Agryll. Some users report incorrect colour measurement after one or two years. ==Links of Interest== *[http://ww1.microchip.com/downloads/en/devicedoc/21709c.pdf EEPROM (24LC02B, 2K / 2048-bit) datasheet] ==Pictures==
